CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Loan_Products__c , 'Loans for consumer durables (CD)') , 0.105 , IF( ISPICKVAL(Loan_Products__c , 'Personal Loans') , 0.13 ,IF( ISPICKVAL(Loan_Products__c , 'Two-Wheeler and Car Loans') , 0.09 , IF( ISPICKVAL(Loan_Products__c , 'Home Loans') , 0.0755 , 0 ))))
CustomField.label: Interest Rate
